about_the_game:
Rolemaster Classic: Fantasy Weapons

A Rolemaster Classic library module for Fantasy Grounds

Sixteen weapon attack tables for Rolemaster Classic and RMSS/FRP:

  • Baw
  • Chakram
  • Chegain
  • Cabis
  • Dag
  • Ge
  • Ikasha
  • Irgaak
  • Kalta
  • Kynac
  • Long Knife
  • Long Kynac
  • Saren
  • Shangkana
  • Typh
  • Yarkbalka

Make sure to check out the instructions for how to assign these in the Fantasy Grounds docs folder. You can get there by clicking on Start->Programs->Fantasy Grounds->Application Data folder and then navigating up to the "docs" folder. Also, be sure to check out the videos and the forums available on the Fantasy Grounds website.

Conversion by: Dakadin

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate License or an active subscription and the Rolemaster Classic ruleset (version 1.51 or higher).
